uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

member_id.description: Stack Member Id. Mandatory for stacked switches.  Not considered for standalone switches and global IP.

ip_address.description: OOBM IP address. This parameter is valid only when ip_address_mode is IAAM_STATIC

ip_mask.description: OOBM IP mask. This parameter is valid only when  ip_address_mode is IAAM_STATIC and ip_address is present

default_gateway.description: OOBM default gateway. This parameter is valid only when  ip_address_mode is IAAM_STATIC
